column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered the Los Drowned sandwich with braised beef
column4: pickled peppers and onions. I was expecting to love this sandwich because it had all my favorite things. However
column5: the beef was dry and fatty. This was really disheartening because of what it could have been. I only finished less than half of the sandwich. I wish that the waiter had noticed that I had hardly touched my food and could have offered something else.
